page.title: 07BISHOP BURTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Parish Council is elected from parishoners. It has the following responsibilities: 1.{Planning permission}- only in-filling and conversions are permitted. 2. Care and cleaning of the{village {ponds. 3. Cutting of grass on greens and verges. 4. Care of{footpaths. 5. Enforcement of parish bye-laws. 6. Control of parish finances. The topics under debate at the moment are: 1 Closure of the village school, which the council has prevented from being closed on two occasions. 2 Dogs fouling footpaths. Also co-ordinates the village entry into the Best Kept Village competition and publishes a monthly newsletter.
